The most likely causes are vitamin C deficiency or immature liver enzymes due to premature birth.",GHR,tyrosinemia
How many people are affected by tyrosinemia ?,"Worldwide, tyrosinemia type I affects about 1 in 100,000 individuals. This type is more common in Norway where 1 in 60,000 to 74,000 individual
